snippet: Ms. Waldman was a stage producer who teamed up with her husband to convert a dilapidated movie house in the Hudson Valley and a bank in the East Village into distinguished theaters.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Waldman was a stage producer who teamed up with her husband to convert a dilapidated movie house in the Hudson Valley and a bank in the East Village into distinguished theaters.
abstract: Honey Waldman, stage producer who teamed up with her husband to convert dilapidated movie house in the Hudson Valley and bank in the East Village into distinguished theaters, died at age 87.

headline.main: Honey Waldman, 87, Dies; Created Theaters From Old Buildings
headline.print_headline: Honey Waldman, 87, Created Theaters From Old Buildings
